Ah! There might be a way! If you utilize the Thorny Vine that we'd planted for the protection of our castle, you just might be able to enter the castle's premises!
If you can somehow remove the thorns from the Thorny Vine, then you should be able to climb over the castle walls just by stepping over the vines. Of course, that would also require a Thorn Remover…

A #bThorn Remover#k is created out of the extracts of the mysterious herbs in the highlands of El Nath. King Pepe used these herbs to intoxicate pigs and take over the Mushroom Forest. #b#t4000501##k is where you'll find the extracts of the herb. Please gather #b100 #t4000501#s#k and bring them to #bSecretary of Magic#k.
This is your only hope of entering the castle. Please think it through and come back to see me if you change your mind.
What? You need a #bThorn Remover#k? Wow, always asking for things that are so difficult to obtain… Well, have you brought all the ingredients for making the remover?

Hmmm, so this is the tail of a pig that was intoxicated by the magic herbs found in the highlands, eh? I can't believe King Pepe controlled his monsters with this… Anyway, you should extract its concentrate, then use spells to purify the extract.
Gather #b100 #t4000501#s#k, then take them over to #b#p1300004##k.
Hmmm? You want me to make a #bThorn Remover#k for you? Simple, you'll need to bring me the ingredients. No point standing here without any ingredients to work with.
